title: Hearthstone World Championship 2021
detail: The Hearthstone 2021 World Championship is here! Eight exceptional players from around the globe—six from Grandmasters and two from the Chinese Gold Series—come together to duel online for the title of Hearthstone 2021 World Champion and their share of a $500,000 prize pool! Two groups of four players will compete in a dual-tournament format until only four remain, after which the competition will shift to a single-elimination bracket. All matches will be played in a best-of-five conquest format with a ban.

competitor.name: Nalguidan
competitor.description: Nalguidan started playing Hearthstone while queuing for other multiplayer games. In just a few short years, he found himself one win away from playing at the Hearthstone World Championship by cracking the bracket of HCT Summer. Nalguidan is currently studying architecture and likes to go swimming in his free time.

competitor.name: glory
competitor.description: Glory, who was born and raised in Japan, started playing Hearthstone with a budget Mech Mage deck in January 2016. Glory has several impressive placements, including taking first place at the APAC Summer Playoffs. He loves anime and manga.
